summary: This document is a financial statement from Fifth Third Bank for a business account associated with Disco Scientia Corporation for the period of December 2015. It details account balances, service charges, and criteria for waiving fees, indicating the financial status of the business during that time.

persons.name: Cesar Taverns
persons.context: Cesar Taverns is identified as the relationship manager for the business account at Fifth Third Bank.

keyFacts: The document is a financial statement for Disco Scientia Corporation.
The statement covers the period from December 1, 2015, to December 31, 2015.
The beginning balance was $515.01, with no withdrawals or deposits during the period.
A standard monthly service charge was waived due to not meeting the balance criteria.
Effective January 1, 2016, a fee will apply to money orders on business accounts.
